current
```{r}

seaLevel <- rnorm(1000, mean = 0, sd = 3)

sealevel_mean <- 0

sealevel_lowtide <- -2.5
sealevel_sd <-3



p_greater_5_low <- pnorm(5, mean = sealevel_lowtide, sd = sealevel_sd, lower.tail = FALSE)
p_greater_5_low  #.6%


p_greater_5_high <- pnorm(5, mean = sealevel_hightide, sd = sealevel_sd, lower.tail = FALSE)

#0.6-20.2%

p_flood_ht_ss1 <- pnorm(5, mean = ht_ss1, sd = sealevel_sd, lower.tail = FALSE)
```

```{r}

sl_prob2 <- sl_prob %>% 
  filter(model == "current" | model == "medium estimate") %>% 
  mutate(model = case_when(
    model == "current" ~ "Current Risk",
    model == "medium estimate" ~ "2050 Medium Estimate"
  )) %>% 
    mutate(model = fct_relevel(model, "Current Risk", "Medium Estimate")) 

ggplot(sl_prob2, aes(x = model, ymin = low_tide_prob, 
         ymax = high_tide_prob, lower = low_tide_prob, upper = high_tide_prob, middle = low_tide_prob), group = model) + 
     geom_boxplot(stat = 'identity', aes(fill = scenario)) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme( # remove the vertical grid lines
           panel.grid.major.x = element_blank() ,
           # explicitly set the horizontal lines (or they will disappear too)
           panel.grid.major.y = element_line( size=.1, color="black" ) 
    ) +
  labs(y = "Flood Risk Range\n", x = " ") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("skyblue1", "dodgerblue2", "blue2", "navy"), labels = c("Normal Condtions", "1m Storm Surge", "2m Storm Surge", "3m Storm Surge")) + 
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Times New Roman")) + 
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 12), axis.text = element_text(size = 10)) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```
